trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when you try to return a version of a <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> that has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 表示当尝试返回的版本时引发的异常<xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>了已删除。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.VersionNotFoundException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.VersionNotFoundException"></xref> class with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.VersionNotFoundException"></xref>以指定字符串的类。

trans-unit.source: The string to display when the exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 要显示时，将引发异常的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.VersionNotFoundException"></xref> class with serialization information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.VersionNotFoundException"></xref>用序列化信息的类。

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: 需序列化或反序列化对象数据。

trans-unit.source: Description of the source and destination of the specified serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 源和目标的指定的序列化流的说明。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.VersionNotFoundException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.VersionNotFoundException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常，则为 null 引用异常 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 如果未指定内部异常是。
